TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It is a matrix metalloproteinase inhibitor and belongs to the family of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors. Also called AG3340.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer. Es un inhibidor de la metaloproteasa de matrizy un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis. También se llama AG3340.
